author: JuliaRegistrator

comments.body:
I had not seen this package. Looks interesting, and could be useful to take advantage of some of their stuff when improving on this framework. I think the parallel tools for running experiments I have provided are different enough to warrant a separate package still though.

Thanks!
Yea, just wanted to point it out (the packages sounded similar).
